# 鸟哥的Linux私房菜：服务器架设篇 第三版

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/niaoge-de-linux-sifang-cai-fuwuqi-jiashe-pian-disanban
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/niaoge-de-linux-sifang-cai-fuwuqi-jiashe-pian-disanban
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install niaoge-de-linux-sifang-cai-fuwuqi-jiashe-pian-disanban
niaoge-de-linux-sifang-cai-fuwuqi-jiashe-pian-disanban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g niaoge-de-linux-sifang-cai-fuwuqi-jiashe-pian-disanban
niaoge-de-linux-sifang-cai-fuwuqi-jiashe-pian-disanban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
